text: The Hestøy Bridge () is a cantilever bridge in the northeastern part of the municipality of Namsos in Trøndelag county, Norway. The bridge is long and has a main span of . The bridge, together with Smines Bridge form a link across the Fjærangen fjord from the Fosnes area to the village of Lund. ==See also== *List of bridges in Norway *List of bridges in Norway by length *List of bridges *List of bridges by length ==References== Category:Road bridges in Trøndelag Category:Namsos
title: Hestøy Bridge
